TEXT.TITLE: E.A. VINER HOLDINGS LTD <EAVKF> 4TH QTR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss 10 cts vs profit seven cts Net loss 918,000 vs profit 585,000 Revs 5,475,000 vs 4,430,000 YEAR Shr profit 32 cts vs loss 24 cts Net profit 2,909,000 vs loss 1,501,000 Revs 23.7 mln vs 15.0 mln Note: 1986 4th qtr net includes 1.5 mln U.S. dlr, or 17 ct shr, writedown of stake in Heck's Inc <HEX> and 300,000 U.S. dlr, or three ct shr, writedown of arbitrage positions. 1986 fl-yr net includes 900,000 dlr net writedown of stake in Heck's. U.S. dlrs. Reuter
